pageTitle: Itinerary for Monday, June 12, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Monday, June 12, 2017:

Ottawa, Ontario 

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the Signing of the Assembly of First Nations-Canada Memorandum of Understanding on Joint Priorities.

Reading Room
Centre Block, Parliament Hill

Note for media:

  • Open coverage for remarks and signing

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question period.

6:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will deliver brief remarks at the World Wildlife Fund Healthy Waters Summit Reception.

Canadian Museum of Nature
240 McLeod Street
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage for remarks
  • Media should arrive no later than 6:00 p.m. and present themselves at the Queensâ€™ Lantern room, on the second floor.
